Aleo is the world’s first full-stack development platform for private applications (powered by zero-knowledge) with speed, integrity and scale.

Aleo is a protocol that works on the technology of Zero Disclosure - ZK (Zero Knowledge). Also, the protocol is programmable, which makes it possible to create truly secure programs. The idea of the project is to create an opportunity to create secure private applications with zero disclosure (ZK), because such an application will be fast and easily scalable.
You can explore all the official links from the start-here channel. There is also a curated list of Aleo and Leo code and resources made by CTO Howard Wu: https://github.com/howardwu/awesome-aleo

Zero Knowledge Technology (Zero Knowledge) is a technology that allows you to confirm any information without disclosing this information. For example: Mai has a basket with 7 apples, John can only let Mai into the castle by making sure there are 7 apples in the basket, but Mai does not want to show him the contents of the basket. ZK makes it possible to confirm Mai`s words without John checking the cart, thus skipping Mai.
PoSW (Proof of Succinct Work).
That’s right, Aleo has its own Leo programming language. You can read more here: https://www.aleo.org/post/leo-programming-language
That’s right, Aleo has created its own development environment, aleo studio: https://www.aleo.studio/
Aleo has a smart contract that allows you to develop applications.

Aleo raised $228 million and was valued at $1.45 billion. Investors: A16z, Coinbase Ventures, Polychain, Slow Ventures, zkValidator, Joseph Lubin, Scalar Capital, Variant Fund, Galaxy Digital, Placeholder VC, Dekrypt Capital, a_capital, Ethereum Ventures, Kora, Softbank, Samsung NEXT and others.
All information https://www.aleo.org/post/aleo-ambassador-program
Articles, memes, infographics, design, graphics, videos, tweets, posters, animations, stickers, etc.
In the official Discord of the project in the channel #user-content.
Materials can be found on the official Aleo website - https://brand.aleo.org/
There are no exact awards, it was only said that ambassadors will be able to get a place on the whitelist, as well as "Aleo Credits".
https://github.com/howardwu/awesome-aleo#wallets here you can check it and download.
The date will be announced, it will be possible to buy on Pre-sale. Beware of scammers.
Aleo coins will be used to pay transaction fees and are expected to be a reward currency for “provers” who will act as L2 providers on top of the network.

With the third round of ambassadors, we are now introducing a third group: the voyagers. Think of the voyagers as the “golden apprentices.” They create very high-quality content, plan and host Aleo meetups, and actively participate inthe community. An ambassador can only become a voyager if they are first an apprentice. Similarly, an ambassador can only become a maestro if they are first a voyager.
You can read more about grant program here: https://www.aleo.org/post/community-grants-program.

Guide: https://github.com/AleoHQ/snarkOS/ Incentives for Aleo Testnet 3 activated on December 2nd at 00:00 UTC Testnet 3 Incentives Kickoff: https://www.aleo.org/post/testnet-3-incentives-kickoff Introducing Provers in Aleo Testnet 3: https://www.aleo.org/post/launching-testnet-3-2-provers The official Explorer is in the final stages of development: https://www.aleo.network/

It is the place where you can learn more about Aleo project and expand your expertise in running nodes, leo language, testnet and just become an active member of the community, participating in other activities as well. Official link to the Aleo education - https://aleoeducation.crew3.xyz/.
Hi be active to contribute to the community.

Rather, installing a node on a rented server test no consists of two types: the first is installing a node on a rented server, taking into account the recommended capacities, the servers cost $ 300 + - the second stage is installing a node for mining a farm from video cards, and one person said that he didn’t even I will rent an expensive server, because according to the hash rate, the video cards will kill those nodes that put the node on the rented server.

When you set up a node, you already create a wallet (snarkos account new). The most important thing is to save all the keys and the address (well, not necessarily, it will be shown), but be sure to save the keys.
Canva. Adobe Illustrator.

Voyager are ambassadors between Apprentice and Maestro. You can only become a Voyager if you have already been Apprentice for at least one round. In each round, Maestro earns 50 points, Apprentice earns 25 points, and Voyager earns 40 points (reminder: Aleo points have no value of their own).
KYC for the Russian Federation in the block, we already have 2 ambassadors unfortunately lost their roles.
Yes, that’s right.
Until January 26, there will be t3 f2, according to the info from the last blog article, even if all the tokens do not have time to get it by this number.

On the fireside, they almost always give the opportunity to present the project (the only thing left to do is wait for it to happen). At the community call, you are unlikely to be able to present (only if you agree on this with Viv or Nodari). You can also present in English at our English Speaking Club (the date is not yet known).

If we are talking about awards, then we initially volunteered and helped the project not in order to receive an award for it. This is everyone’s decision. Of course, it’s nice, but getting experience, most often, is a hundred times more important than getting something material.
In general, the stronger the iron, the faster. I think that 32 and 40, 40 will be stronger.
Need to test. The algorithm is new, while there is little statistical data.

No. Here is a different algorithm, the prover usually does not eat all the flows. Your kernels generate proof, solve mathematical primitives, reaching a certain difficulty target - you can say some level of performance. If 24 cores, let’s say, have a performance of 10 conventional units, and 240 cores 100, then the winner will be the one who reaches this target and the rewards will be distributed proportionally. If your 24 cores do not reach the minimum target value at all, then no rewards will be awarded at all.
